name: Siobhan and Erol
letter: Thank you so much for the navy blue towels, I've never had such soft and high quality ones before! I look forward to seeing you in 2024!

name: Karen
letter: Thank you so much for the Panettone! It was delicious! I look forward to seeing you in Febrary as I will be playing the cello in Abby's Serenade for Strings!

name: Tom, Kirstin, Tate & Miles
letter: Thank you so much for the generous christmas money as well as the '7 Wonders' board game! I bought some really high quality headphones with the money. I look forward to playing the game with some of my friends next weekend!
